divs: Sighting DetailsWe are unsure whether this occurrence has anything to do with an extraterrestrial event, however an extremely loud boom took place at 1:50 PM that was heard and felt throughout the town of Potsdam, NY as well as the various surrounding areas within at least a ten mile radius. It was felt by practically every person in Potsdam; it rattled windows, shook entire houses and buildings, and has mystified all who have addressed it. No evidence supporting a geologic explanation has been found. At the time of the boom I was taking a historical geology lab test and we were all distracted by a loud noise and felt the entire room shake. We were in a ground level classroom with a metal ceiling.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Potsdam
There were no other sightings in Potsdam on or around February 23rd 2010
